# multipleSelectionColor

**Instance Property**

The color to use for the separators of the item the configuration applies to when the item is in a multiple-selection group.

## Declaration

```swift
var multipleSelectionColor: UIColor { get set }
```

## Configuring separator appearance

- **color**: The color to use for the separators of the item the configuration applies to.
- **visualEffect**: The visual effect to use for the separators of the item the configuration applies to.
